name: Dungeon Siege

files.installer: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Dungeon Siege/DS.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2008 vcrun2010 win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
